overview: The eighth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. I was horrified at first sight. The contributor said, but it seems that there is a girl's spirit on this bridge. It is said that the last place where the body of the girl who drowned upstream in the past drifted was under this bridge. After that, Jizo Bosatsu was built on both sides of the bridge.
tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 8
